Articles.Content:
On 7/31/2020 at 7:47 PM, Xd the great said:

This mod needs BDAC as a dependency.

And bdac has not been updated to 1.10 yet.

BDAc works fully in KSPv1.10 no need to recompile it.
but i didn't work for me

I've made a lot of changes to the github repo . There are several changes that need made for the next update on your local side. The very first thing is the North Kerbin Dynamics folder name in the download needs changed to NKDR. Everything needs to match how I have it on the repo so it won't mess up others installs. Next update your local cs file to match what I've changed to the cs file on the repo dev branch and recompile the plugin and upload that plugin to the master branch of the repo for me, this should stop the errors. All versions of NKD will need removed from installs before installing the next update as conflicts are occuring if not and people will need warned of the change so crafts aren't broken. Merge the current pull request to the master branch.

Edited September 16, 2020 by Next_Star_Industries
@Next_Star_IndustriesThen you need to change the cfg file path

2 hours ago, cukkoo said:

@Next_Star_IndustriesThen you need to change the cfg file path

I don't think you're understanding me. You need to match what I've done on the repo for your mod to work correctly. I've went through and changed everything and made a proper mod. I've made the changes to the cs file that will need changed on your end. If you recompile the plugin with the changes I've made to the cs file and upload it to the master branch of the repo it'll make your mod work finally. Follow what I've done to the config files of parts and your set. You'll be set to do an update of your mod that revives NKD, aside from adding your module to the config files of what ever parts. There is nothing else I can do, the way I set up your repo is the proper way to build a mod for ksp. You'll also need to change the licence to the way harpowner has his, it has to match BDAc.
@Next_Star_Industriesok jsut i want to use cc by 4.0 instead as it is the original license form harpwner

YESSSS thank you so much.

a true comrade
You should thank harpwner for the mod,i just make it work for the latest version.

New update coming ,And it is the biggest one  .Space explosion,Air explosion,Underwater explosion  and more nuke coming.I just need sometime to create the space explosion and all the effect.This should come altogether  in the twenty fifth of the december as i need to practice for the middle exam and other real life situation.

I have literally everything in this package, but when they land, they don't explode, they just seem like... nothing happened

How to solve this dilemma of mines (my version is 1.10.1 btw)
Hmmm game data folder mod pls and Do you install BDA and module manager? PRE will corrupt the install i think? PRE had corrupt my install
My problem is solved. I nuked the KSC already.
Well then Good luck make jeb survive
He died when I dropped the tsar bob-a at the launchpad
Well good he didn't experience my Anti-matter bomb that is in development

Is this meant to work with KSP v 1.11?

Also will it work with runway bdac?
Well it should work with original BDA but may not work with the runway version
Are there any statistics concerning the minimum safe distance from the various nukes in the mod

Well the minimum safe distance for at least,Not complete destruction for tsar bomba is 5 km and the distance that no part is destroyed is 27 km,But BDA may calculate Occlusion so if your back of VAB you may survive,As i test this out already

Hello. 

I just wanna ask. do you intend to add new bombs?  well anyhow thanks for reviving this
Well i will but it is a stub as i currently just dunno how to create particle effect for ksp,When i try.It never work.I'm searching for a solution for like 1 year now

On 3/27/2021 at 10:14 AM, cukkoo said:

Well i will but it is a stub as i currently just dunno how to create particle effect for ksp,When i try.It never work.I'm searching for a solution for like 1 year now

Make a new empty GameObject with KSP part tools at the location of the thrust transform this will be the new 0,0,0 x,y,zparent origin for the particle effect. Make sure that the new empty object is facing in the exact same orientation as the thrust transform with Z+ pointing in the desired direction of thrust

Can you give me the unity file?as my unity setup doesn't have the

Quote

Z+ pointing 

As the direction is universal in my setup

Please, please please add the MIRV back. I can't find any other replacement for an ICBM warhead that works
If you have an idea what i could what i could use in the meantime please tell me

Well here's current mirv that used megaton bomb explosion as the mirv explosion dont work also place this in the part folder in the NKDR folder https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1D_CKFyRfG-7vhxSF89RdLtk9O2yPRXH3?usp=sharing
